items.sentence: If you can\'t come, you should let me know ahead of time.
If you continue doing that, you\'ll probably get injured.
There\'s a good chance that Tom won\'t be at the meeting.
I never thought that Tom would one day become vegetarian.
I plan to give my son a computer at the end of the month.
I put the key in exactly the same place where I found it.
We should start getting Christmas gifts for the children.
We talked about what we had done during the summer break.
We were in Boston last month for a few days visiting Tom.
I\'m sure that by the time you get here, we\'ll be ready.
Tom was just about to say something when the door opened.
All I want now is a hot shower and a good night\'s sleep.
Tom is not available at the moment. May I take a message?
It takes fifteen minutes to walk from here to the campus.
Last Saturday, our kids played in the park near the lake.
It\'s really dark outside. I wonder if a storm is coming.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary will go camping with us or not.
Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
Tom teaches history at the high school across the street.
Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the bus stop?
I didn\'t know that Tom and Mary were brother and sister.
I didn\'t like the fact that Tom was going out with Mary.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary are ever going to be friends.

This is Tom\'s second year playing professional baseball.
Tom was glad when Mary offered to help him in the garden.
Tom was sitting alone at one of the tables near the door.
When I was in high school, I got up at six every morning.
I couldn\'t have wished for a better gift this Christmas.
I don\'t feel safe walking in that neighborhood at night.
A solution acceptable to all parties was finally reached.
Can you translate this manuscript from French to English?
Children want to hear the same story over and over again.
Tom can\'t believe Mary knows why John doesn\'t like her.
I wondered why Tom didn\'t seem to enjoy fishing with us.
I\'ll be waiting for you at the station tomorrow morning.
I\'m prepared to give you a second chance if you want it.
I just feel like I\'m not doing what you expect me to do.
I shouldn\'t have to go to the dentist again for a while.
It never occurred to me that Tom would want to meet Mary.
It took me almost three hours to finish my math homework.
It was one of the most incredible experiences of my life.
I wonder whether or not I should really become a teacher.
These stairs are a little slippery, so please be careful.
We have to tell Tom before he hears it from someone else.
I\'ve already told Tom that I don\'t know how to do that.
The reason why I got a bad grade is that I did not study.

They announced that they were planning to live in Boston.
This is the third time this month that Tom has been late.

I get the feeling that I\'ve heard that somewhere before.
I\'m tired of always listening to the same kind of music.
I\'ve always been impressed by how well you speak French.

I need to take my car to the mechanic\'s to get it fixed.
When did you find out that Tom couldn\'t legally do that?
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t enjoy ice skating?

When Tom was a young boy, he used to love climbing trees.
When she returned to her room, the diamond ring was gone.
Tom finished writing the report in less than three hours.
Tom had no choice but to do what the boss told him to do.
Would you please tell Tom why you don\'t want to do that?
Wouldn\'t it be better if Tom did that with someone else?
I\'m supposed to pay my rent on the first of every month.
I\'m the only one who knows where Tom hid the gold coins.
I\'ve made up my mind to give back all the money I stole.
Tom hopes to inherit a lot of money when his mother dies.
Tom hung the three pairs of wet jeans on the clothesline.
What\'s the difference between liking and loving someone?
Tom claims he knows the value of pi to a thousand places.
Tom and Mary managed to sort everything out on their own.
We didn\'t have enough time to finish what we were doing.
Tom tried to start a fire by rubbing two sticks together.
Tom used a fire extinguisher to try and put the fire out.
Tom usually eats anything that Mary puts in front of him.
Tom waited until the end of the evening to approach Mary.
Tom walked into the kitchen, carrying a bag of groceries.
Tom wanted Mary to invite John and Alice over for dinner.
The noise outside his window prevented him from sleeping.
The party will take place in the garden, unless it rains.
Tom and Mary wanted to spend a few days in the mountains.
My uncle was the only person injured in the car accident.
Tom shook the tree, hoping at least one apple would fall.
Tom should go to see Mary in the hospital this afternoon.
Tom should have known better than to kiss Mary in public.

Tom slipped quietly out of bed and went into the kitchen.
Tom sometimes calls Mary in the morning before breakfast.
It\'s been a week, but I\'m still suffering from jet lag.
Mary\'s father warned Tom to stay away from his daughter.
Next Friday, I\'m going on a date with a girl named Mary.
Why didn\'t Tom tell us that he didn\'t know how to swim?

When you have a cold, you should drink plenty of liquids.
Why on earth did you not do what you were supposed to do?

I\'m going to make sure Tom does what you told him to do.
